After Dewey leaves the apartment, Gloria has over some 'medical doctors' who give her 'medication' involving a blood transfusion. Dewey goes home where his girlfriend, Olive, arrives and shows off some of her latest wardrobe and plays around with him, despite his lack of interest in her. Dewey phones his friend Allen, a hippy who is also a struggling actor and sells drugs on the sides in wanting to look to finance his first directing gig. Meanwhile, Brandex is another bare-chested actor who flirts with Cathy, a dim-witted actress/stoner who debates which blouse to wear for the upcoming show. Miss Gloria (Ann Linden), a wealthy, 30-something, albeit washed-up Hollywood actress, spends an afternoon in her Manhattan townhouse having sex with a younger man, a local hustler named Dewey (Robert Service), whom she pays him $100 for the sex. Gloria excuses him from her house (giving Dewey the keys to her white sports car parked on the street), when her doctors arrive. One doctor (Hal Borske) is to administer heroin while another doctor and his nurse are there to administer a blood transfusion. The other doctor suggests they spend the evening together at some of the happenings in the East Village.Meanwhile, Dewey returns home to his small and crumbling apartment where he takes a bath and has a phone conversation with Allen (Gerald Jaccuzzo) a tuberculosis-stricken Southern hippy filmmaker who wants to hire Dewey to appear in his next "experimental film." Just then Olive (Candy Hammond), a nympho and struggling actress, arrives at Dewey's apartment for sex, but he does not return her feelings towards him.Elsewhere, Brandex (Matt Baylor) is another part-time actor/hustler who is with his tart girlfriend Cathy, a stoner who wants to appear in Allen's latest film that he is currently working on. Allen pays a visit to him to discuss his film project, and he later goes to Dewey's apartment to discuss the film and asks if he would like the part as the lead role.Olive returns to her own small apartment where she writes 'Olive loves Dewey... in death" in lipstick on her mirror and then commits suicide by removing all her clothes and shoots herself with a small pistol she kept in her purse.At Allen's apartment, a friend of his calls a doctor who examines him and declares that he has a lung hemorrhage as a result of his TB. When the doctor says that he would like to get Allen to the hospital right away, he replies "Why wait, Doc? You can get me right here!" The doctor gives Allen a small bottle of antibiotic pills and then leaves. After taking a few pills, Allen seems to feel better and his coughing subsides.That evening, Dewey picks up Miss Gloria outside her townhouse in her sports car and drives her to a local nightclub/theater called Cafe Der Fuhrer where the German butch owner (Maggie Rogers) is putting on an "abstract play" titled 'The Linda Darnell Story' which is staged with a drag queen and two other bare-chested men (one of whom is Allen). Things take a bad turn when some of Dewey's psychedelic friends make remarks about Gloria's age and she catches him snickering. In the back room of the club, Dewey and Gloria get involved in a pie fight orgy that ends with the death of Allen, who tries to party too soon after his recovery.When Allen's dead body is removed from the area, everyone is bummed out and leaves. Gloria then meets with two dangerous-looking tart friends of hers, named Jade and Opal, whom abduct Dewey, tie him face down on a bed, and strip him naked for punishment. Miss Gloria and the other women begin whipping and beating Dewey with leather belts to which Miss Gloria exalts: "On the map of human experience, pain is the compass rose. The point leading to the true north".

Title: Two Faces of the Dollar
Synopsis: A teacher, a hero, an ex colonel and a beautiful woman hatch a plan to rob Fort Henderson. When they succeed their troubles just begins.

Title: L'uomo del colpo perfetto
Synopsis: After millions of Diamonds are stolen, Secret Agent Steve Norton chases around the Mediterranean trying to keep up with the thieves and re-capture the loot. Larry Anderson.

Title: He Walked Through the Fields
Synopsis: Based on the novel by Moshe Shamìr. Uri, the first son of a "kibbutz", comes home from 2 years of studying. He finds his father has joined the British army, and his mother is with another man. He meets Mika - a new immigrant from Poland - and quickly falls in love with her. He is then torn between his commitment to his home family and girl, and between the "Palmakh".—Anonymous The year is 1946, two years before Israel's independence. Uri returns home to his rural kibbutz after two years at college and finds his father has joined the British army and his mother is sleeping with another man. Then he meets Mika a young Holocaust refugee and falls in love. But young love is put on hold when Uri is drafted into the Palmach armed forces to fight for Israel on the verge of it's statehood. Will Uri's patriotism keep him from his love. Mika and his unborn child?

Title: Martyrs of Love
Synopsis: A series of loosely-connected shorts comprised of three tales representing different aspects of love: temptation, dreams, and adventure.

Title: Burning Mountain
Synopsis: In the early 1950s when Korea is still at war, Kyu Bok who escaped from the North Korean People's Army secretly sneaks into a small village in the mountainside. This village has turned into a widowed village due to the war and widows Jum Rye and Sa Wol live across from one another. Jum Rye had to take care of her mother-in-law who was also a widow, a dote grandfather-in-law, and a sister-in-law. Sawol lives with her mother. Sawol's husband was a soldier from the South and Jum Rye's was a soldier from the North, making the two women hostile towards one another.—Canon y mus

Title: El tesoro de Makuba
Synopsis: Cameron Mitchell hunts for treasure in the Polynesian Islands. The Director uses the name Joe Lacy.

Title: Portrait of Chieko
Synopsis: Takamura, poet and sculptor, is married to Chieko, who also has artistic desires. However, she is becoming increasingly aware that she can not match her husband's work.

Title: Kinoautomat
Synopsis: This Czech comedy was arguably the first theatrical interactive movie ever created. The audience could vote what should happen next by pressing buttons of different color. As intentional irony, there's only one ending. A big Prague apartment building is on fire. Mr Novák, tenant of the apartment on the sixth floor, considers himself the culprit of the fire. On that day, his wife had a birthday and Mr Novák went home with a bouquet and was slightly drunk. Thus, it happened that he mistakenly rang the bell of the neighboring flat of the Svobodas. Then he sobered somewhat and eventually found the way to his own apartment. The young and pretty Mrs Svobodová was taking a shower. When she ran out to find out who rang the bell, wrapped only in a bath sheet, the draft slammed her door shut. The desperate blonde rang Mr Novák's bell and forced herself into his apartment, where she was soon discovered by her husband and Mr Novák' wife.—NFA.cz

Title: Three Nights of Love
Synopsis: A young soldier, who has spent the last three nights before he leaves for the front with his lover, discovers when he deserts to be with her once more that she has betrayed him, and decides to report to the police who are questioning him, that she is a Communist.—Lawrence Chadbourne

Title: Noorjehan
Synopsis: Noor Jahan, the empress of the Mughal empire, becomes the favourite wife of Emperor Jahangir and steadily begins to exert more influence on the throne through her love for him.

Title: Begushchaya po volnam
Synopsis: The young pianist Thomas Harvey finds the brig "Hurrying through the Waves". After a brawl, Harvey is abandoned alone in a lifeboat, cut adrift from its moorings. By a miracle, a fair maiden appears in the boat. She reassures him. Anglers salvage Harvey. There is a charming girl among them: Daisy. They tell him the legend of the nocturnal rescuer, Frasie Grand, who rushes through the waves. All sailors in distress have regarded her as a symbol. People have raised a monument to her. By the end of the carnival, Harvey sees yet another crime in progress: the demolition of the Monument to the Hurrying through the Waves. He is the only one to confront the rampaging mob. Harvey once again meets the little sweet Daisy who shares his dream.—Georgi Djulgerov <georgidjul1943@gmail.com>

Title: The Singles
Synopsis: Swinging singles use computer dating to hook up.

Title: La niña del patio
Synopsis: An orphan child arrives at a house courtyard where the neighbours must organise a flamenco show to avoid the house from being sold by its owner... A group of picturesque characters live in a neighborhood in the Casco Viejo neighborhood of Madrid. Among them, Carmen stands out, a beautiful and friendly forties with a strong character and a kind heart. Behind her are two suitors: Zacarías, a cobbler, and Miguel, a pretty nice scrap metal.—Miguel Ángel Díaz González

Title: Chand Par Chadayee
Synopsis: After landing on the moon, an astronaut and his associate face off against a variety of warriors and monsters from another planet. Captain Anand and his paternal cousin, Bhagu, set off on a mission to the moon. Once there, Anand is captured, asked to wrestle a gorilla, and emerges victorious. A number of women want to make him his, and even compete with each other - but he gives his heart to Rajkumari Shimoga. Things take a turn for the worst when warrior king, Barahatu, who wants to make Shimoga his, as well as rule the moon, attacks and abducts Shimoga, while his deceptive assistant, Simi, travels to Earth, and abducts Anand's mother and vocally-challenged sister, Rekha.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Chandan Ka Palna
Synopsis: Ajit lives with his mother, and comes from a very wealthy family. He meets with beautiful Shobha and both fall in love with each other. Ajit's mom is delighted and agrees to meet with Harikishan Rai, Shobha's father, to finalize their marriage. The marriage takes place with great pomp and ceremony. A few years later, Ajit notices a change in Shobha's behavior. She changes her lifestyle, adopts a more liberal outlook, takes to drinking alcohol, and has an hair-cut. Ajit and his mom are perplexed and appalled at this change, and want to find out, but Shobha refuses to tell them anything. One day, Shobha and Ajit's mom have an argument, and Shobha angrily lifts up her hand to slap her, only to be stopped by Ajit, who asks Shobha to leave immediately. Shobha leaves and returns to her father's house, leaving Ajit and his mother behind wondering what had changed Shobha so much, and whether to get Ajit married a second time or not.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Caballos de acero
Synopsis: Javier de la Lama is a young motorcycle racing fan, but after enrolling in the academy, he will begin to have issues with the captain.

Title: Target Frankie
Synopsis: A secret agent/International playboy who "just happens" to look like a famous scientist, allows himself to be captured by the opposition, in order to thwart their plans. After many car chases and intrigue, he manages to get away with "the secret plans".—Larry Anderson

Title: Golden Chameleon
Synopsis: Vittorio, an employee of an insurance company, is the only witness to an incident where a thief called the golden chameleon dies. In his suitcase Vittorio finds the instructions to carry out a robbery. He decides to assume the identity of the golden chameleon and carry out the robbery.—Ulf Kjell Gür

Title: You've Got to Be Smart
Synopsis: A slick conman finds a singing teenage preacher in a small town in Arkansas and brings him to Los Angeles, where he sets him up with his own show and waits for the money to come pouring in.

Title: Das große Glück
Synopsis: Hans-Jürgen wants to start a new life after the wedding of Marika because that's also the end for the ice skating dream couple Kilius-Bäumler. The wedding of Marika means the end of the career of the ice skating dream couple Kilius-Bäumler. Hans-Jürgen now also wants to start a whole new life. When the clever manager Wallace tries to force him into an unfair contract for his ice skating review, Hans-Jürgen tries everything to prove that he can do more than just ice skating. Wallace cannot prevent Hans-Jürgen from having professional success through intrigues, but his new love for Lilo seems to be destroyed as a result.

Title: The Vicious Circle
Synopsis: A young woman, Maria, is processing her life trauma. She travels head-first to a small village and finds shelter at an inn, inhabited by a dysfunctional family. Marias arrival stirs a lot of emotion...

Title: Poker with Pistols
Synopsis: After losing everything in a poker game and finding himself indebted, Lucas agrees to deliver a wagon to the town of Chamaco for the $5000 payment. He soon finds himself in deep trouble with bandits, the town's local kingpin and a pretty saloon worker.—youtube

Title: Ninaivil Nindraval
Synopsis: This Story revolves around a Young lady played by K.R.Vijaya who lost her memory accidently & moved to new City where he Met the Hero and Fall in love with him. After marrying to him in an another accident she lost the memories of her marriage. Finally Ravichandran Meets her in person where she is engaged to another person. Packed with Full Time Comedy of Nagesh & Cho.

Title: Hong Kil-dong
Synopsis: A special boy is born on a day where hurricanes and wicked spirits struck medieval Korea. The citizens and family learn that the infant has super human strength and cunning intelligence. As the boy grows up, he vows to his family, the emperor of Korea and the high deities to rid Korea of chaos and disorder caused by wicked beings.—Mitora

Title: The Search for the Evil One
Synopsis: A team of agents is sent to a secret location in South America to investigate reports that a group of Nazis actually rescued Adolf Hitler at the end of the war and are hiding him.

Title: El próximo otoño
Synopsis: History of love between a pilot of a pleasure craft and a French girl on vacation in Spain. Unfortunately, once the holidays are over, she will have to return to France to start her classes at the university. A summer love history between Juan, a local sailor of a pleasure craft, and Monique, a French girl on vacation in Almuñécar, Spain. Unfortunately, once the holidays are over, she will have to return to Paris to start her classes at the university.—jsanchez

Title: Aag
Synopsis: Shanker is a young man who lives in a small village community with his mute sister, Durgi, and his mom, Shanti. Shanker's efforts to get Durgi married are all in vain. The local money-lender, Lala, in his early 60s, comes to know about this and proposes to marry Durgi, but is refused, and asked to leave. Lala plots vengeance, and gets his chance to rape Durgi, resulting in the death of Durgi. Shanker hunts him down, and kills him. Lala's death involves the police, and Shanker must run from them. He does so, and joins a gang of dacoits and pledges to be part of their gang, not knowing that in so doing, he will be spending the rest of his life, hiding in caverns and the countryside, unable to see his mother anymore, nor any normal human being, for the rest of his life.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: One-Penny Youth
Synopsis: With her husband refusing to let her work, a newlywed wife lands a job as a typist at the same company where he works. Soon, she will have to face him. Will she manage to calm him, especially when the firm's owner is a suave philanderer? Struggling to stay afloat, the blissful newly-weds, Yorgos and Irini Strataki, are between a rock and a hard place. Even though they have already fallen behind on the monthly instalments for their house, Yorgos insists on refusing to let Irini find a job, preferring to swallow his pride and live temporarily with his mother-in-law, Marika. Under those circumstances and unable to put up with her husband's irrational decision, Irini secretly lands a job as a typist at the same car company where Yorgos works, knowing that, pretty soon, she will have to come face-to-face with him. Will Irini manage to calm her spouse, especially when the firm's owner is the notorious philanderer and suave lady-killer, Dimitris Valaskos?—Nick Riganas

Title: Ave Kallu
Synopsis: Rich and pretty, Susila returns from college to find that her family is being bumped off one by one. The only clues are a half smoked cigar left at the scene of each murder and a mysterious woman in white running through the courtyard.

Title: Stasera mi butto
Synopsis: The son of an Italian Countess meets a young lady staying at a seaside resort with friends. His attentions are turned when a U.S. celebrity, Lola Falana, comes to town and steals his affections. Marisa, the young lady, thinks she should turn her attention to a professor also staying at the resort, but her friends think otherwise and push her to fight for her young man.

Title: Las 4 bodas de Marisol
Synopsis: Marisol is a movie star who is about to marry the director of her latest film. The wedding ceremony is interrupted by three men who claim to be engaged to marry the actress.

Title: Deiva Thirumagal
Synopsis: Watch the full movie, Deivath Thirumagal, only on Eros Now. Deivath Thirumagal is a 1995 Indian Tamil film, directed by M.A.Thirumugam. The film stars Muthuraman, S. A. Ashokan and Nalini. in lead roles. The film had musical score by S.A.Devakar.

Title: Like a Shooting Star
Synopsis: A young yakuza hitman named Goro does a job and needs to hideout away from Tokyo for a while. He hangs out with loose women and hard men and always manages to stay one step ahead of the law. In his exile, he comes under suspicion for a murder and meets the girlfriend of the murdered man. They develop a strange bond while unbeknown to Goro, another hitman is after him for the job he did in Tokyo.—Fred Cabral <ftcabral@hotmail.com>

Title: The Reluctant Sadist
Synopsis: A poor dandy embezzles large sums of money and buys the title Marquis De Sade to impress the upper class. The film premiered as "I am a Marquis."

Title: Burnt Skin
Synopsis: Mass inner migration in Spain from Andalusia to Catalonia in the 60s is portrayed in two stages: first the husband, who must adapt to his new country, find work and a place for his family to live. Then his wife and children. Any shock must be overcome by their vital needs.—chiendalou

Title: Jerk à Istambul
Synopsis: Vincent And Gregoire have just won a lot a money.The latter wants the whole pile and flies away to Turkey where he meets a compatriot,Appoline,and her boss Samos. Vincent and Gregoire have just won a lot a money.The latter wants the whole pile and flies away to Turkey where he meets a compatriot,Apolline,who sings in a nightclub owned by a shady boss,Samos who uses his entertainer to spy on the French guy .With his gang he succeeds in stealing all the money from the naive young man.But they have not heard the last of Vincent,who turns up ,determined to recover his dough.—dbdumonteil

Title: Le canard en fer blanc
Synopsis: A pilot gets busted in an imaginary South America country and is sentenced to death. He is saved from the fire squad by a bunch of so called revolutionaries. A pilot gets busted in an imaginary South America country and is sentenced to death. He is saved from the fire squad by a bunch of so called revolutionaries. He's got to fly them to Santa Costa, another imaginary country, where a hidden pile of money will help them overthrow the tyrants and restore liberty and democracy. But some people of the group's motives are not as clear as they appear at first sight: money can't buy happiness, but it does help, so on the way to the promised land, a villain is slowly doing away with his mates.—dbdumonteil

Title: Bonditis
Synopsis: Frank Born believes himself to be a secret agent so his psychiatrist prescribes some time away at a relaxing village in the Swiss Alps. The delusional Born gets enmeshed in a secret international summit and is soon pursuing a coveted microfilm.

Title: Encrucijada para una monja
Synopsis: During an uprising in the Belgian Congo, a convent of nuns are besieged and the Reverend Mother is killed and Sister Maria is raped. Returning to Belgium, Sister Maria finds out to her horror that she is pregnant. Rejected by her family and her sister, she is told by the Vatican that she is supposed to either give the baby to the church and still be a nun or keep the baby and leave the order. This film follows her decision.—Christopher

Title: A Love Story
Synopsis: María and Daniel are a young couple who are expecting their first child. To help María in the last weeks of pregnancy, her sister Sara sets up with them in the house. The cohabitation of Sara with the couple rekindles the love she always felt towards her brother-in-law. But Daniel is also attracted to her, something that does not go unnoticed by María. Daniel and Sara can not hide that they love each other, but neither can they hide another common feeling: that of not hurting María.—jsanchez

Title: Hatey Bazarey
Synopsis: A idealist doctor engages in a feud with the son of local landlord for the latter's infatuation over a tribal girl whom he forces to live with her despite her denial.

Title: A múmia közbeszól
Synopsis: A real Hungarian spy story from the 60s. An entire army of spies across the ocean is fighting for the Hungarian invention that protects humanity, because in this country they would only start manufacturing it in the next five-year plan. The checkered briefcase is carried by the engineer of the invention office over mountains and valleys, on trains and in the air. The prominent figure of the police group led by Pharaoh, the Mummy, also gets involved in the complicated chases.

Title: Dante no es únicamente severo
Synopsis: The impossible relationship between a man and a woman, but also the destruction of aesthetics. The girl wants to seduce her beloved with incoherent stories that he does not care at all. Through this relationship, the film projects the idea according to which it is impossible to tell a story. The project does not pursue the coherence of a well-told story, rather it demands to observe what is shown and to deepen the different facets of the characters. Its purpose is to lay the foundations of a certain pop aesthetic in a Spanish way, in which the images can not refer to the world but to the publicity that the world sells to us.—jsanchez

Title: The Killing Bottle
Synopsis: Two agents of the International Secret Police must prevent a crime organization from assassinating the President of Buddabai and his General.

Title: Diwana
Synopsis: Meet Pyarelal, a simple-minded, naive young man, orphaned at birth, living with a Muslim landlady, Fatima, who treats him like her son. When the police arrest Pyarelal on the charge of murder, no one really believes that this harmless man could harm anyone, leave alone kill. Their belief is shattered when Pyarelal openly admits in Court that he has indeed committed this crime, and demands capital punishment for it.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: The Handsome, the Ugly, and the Stupid
Synopsis: Two POWs learn of a treasure of gold hidden in a cemetery, and escape from their POW camp to look for it.

Title: Julie Is No Angel
Synopsis: The many sexual adventures and relations of a sophisticated young woman.

Title: Kongjwi and Patjwi
Synopsis: The traditional Korean story of a Cinderella-like little girl. Kongjwi is a good, hard working girl who lives together with her cruel stepmother and the lazy Patjwi. Eventually kindly spirits arrive and assist Kongjwi escape her miserable home life.—Anonymous

Title: Zlatna pracka
Synopsis: Film comedy about 19th century Serbian peasants who emigrate to the Wild West.

Title: My Body Hungers
Synopsis: Marcia, a sexy bucolic orphan, hitch-hikes to the city to meet up with her sister, who has promised her a job at the roadhouse where she works as a hostess. She has no qualms about sleeping with her driver in order to be safeguarded to her destination. Once she arrives, she discovers that her sister has recently been violently murdered -- in a stangulation by garter belt. Marcia takes her sister's job in order to go undercover in finding the murderer. She thus imperils her own life while making discoveries about her sister's former lifestyle and the seamy antics of the local civic leaders.—GoblinHairedGuy

Title: Goodachari 116
Synopsis: A secret agent gets killed by an international criminal gang when he gathers photographic evidence against them, so Gopi (Agent 116) now investigates this case to get the criminal gang arrested.

Title: St. Pauli zwischen Nacht und Morgen
Synopsis: Helmut Schmidt is an ambitious Interpool inspector. He follows a trail of dangerous drug dealers that leads to Hamburg. With the colleagues there, he decides to infiltrate the gang. The beautiful dancer Arlette helps him.

Title: Funnyman
Synopsis: An improvisational comedian, working with The Committee improv group in San Francisco, struggles to be taken seriously.

Title: The Sunday of Life
Synopsis: After five years in the army, Valentin Brû marry a haberdasher. They move to Paris, where Valentin sells frames, while his wife becomes fortune teller. One day, Valentin replaces her, and predict a terrible event which will happen.

Title: Woman Despiser
Synopsis: A killer murders women whose first initials match the first letter of the district they are killed in.

Title: Keskpäevane praam
Synopsis: The events take place in Estonia in a summer in the 1960s. The Boy and the Girl want to go from mainland Estonia to the island of Saaremaa, but they do not have any money to buy the ticket to the ferry. They manage to hide themselves into a lorry that carries hay. Because they are smoking while they are on the lorry, a fire breaks out. The problem is, that the ferry in the middle of the sea.—Sven L.

Title: Juego peligroso
Synopsis: Two stories set in Río de Janeiro: The first (HO) is about a man who picks up a newlywed couple on the highway to Río; their car is wrecked and the man offers to deliver the bride to their honeymoon bungalow. Everything goes wrong when the man's wife catches him with the bride in his car. The second story (Divertimento) is about a woman who wants to kill her lover's wife, not knowing that her lover and his wife plan to stage the crime to blackmail her.—Maximiliano Maza <mmaza@campus.mty.itesm.mx>

Title: Katerina Izmailova
Synopsis: Katerina murders her husband and her father-in-law. She and her new beau are both sent to Siberia, where the lover almost immediately takes up with a younger woman.

Title: Agente Sigma 3 - Missione Goldwather
Synopsis: An electronic ray that can counter any aerial attacks has just been invented by Professor Goodwin, but before he can put in good hands, he is kidnapped by a criminal organization, that starts an international bid for him and his invention among the rogue countries of the world. The CIA sends Agent Sigma 3 to find the Professor before the transaction takes place. His mission takes him from Rome to Tangiers, and to Barcelona.—Artemis-9

Title: Casse-tête chinois pour le judoka
Synopsis: Judoka Marc Saint-Clair tries to save the world from nuclear disaster fighting Chinese and Russians. Marc Saint-Clair wins a medal at a Kendo tournament in Tokyo, Japan. He offers his medal to his American friend Clyde as a good luck charm. As an airline pilot, Clyde accompanies a C.IA. agent, Finn, in a secret mission to investigate over China regarding a supersonic bomber. While Clyde is absent, Marc has an affair with Clyde's girlfriend Jennifer, before he learns of the pilot's disappearance. In grief, Marc goes by boat to Hong Kong, trying to know what happened to Clyde. One month later, a young Chinese woman who escaped from an organization, the Black Dragons, reaches Marc and informs him that Clyde is alive and detained in a secret island. Starting from there, Marc (a.k.a. Judoka) must face the henchmen of this organization with his judo skills and try to save the world, along with the C.I.A. and the bumbling Jennifer..—Campy60sFan

Title: Don Juan 67
Synopsis: Millionaire Mauricio is an irrepressible Don Juan who lives only to seduce women of every class and condition. With help from his butler he manages to capture the hearts of many only to abandon them; finally he has a panic marriage.

Title: Sri Krishnavataram
Synopsis: The life story of Sri Krishna.

Title: Operation Delilah
Synopsis: A couple try to help the residents of a small Caribbean island overthrow a dictator.

Title: Las pirañas
Synopsis: Ricardo is an executive who has great success with women and behaves almost like a play-boy. His wife, Carmen, an attractive housewife without children, it feels ignored by him and seeks solace from her mother, who proposes Carmen a change in the way she acts in order to do not lose permanently her husband or even fall into madness.—jsanchez

Title: La isla de los dinosaurios
Synopsis: A group of scientists in search of lost Atlantis are plane wrecked on an uncharted island inhabited by monsters of the prehistoric era.

Title: Proêzas de Satanás na Vila de Leva-e-Traz
Mundo depravados
Synopsis: Two police detectives are assigned to investigate the murders of several young women at a health club.

Title: Glorious Times in the Spessart
Synopsis: The countess is married, and the ghosts are still in the Spessart. Her husband becomes an astronaut and the story involving time and space traveling starts.

Title: Min kones ferie
Synopsis: Allan (Axel Strøbye) and his wife (Ghita Nørby) go on a long overdue vacation, where Allan, wanting a divorce, finds her a new suitor (Ove Sprogøe), but Allan slowly starts to realize what a mistake he's made.

Title: La lunga sfida
Synopsis: A child is kidnapped by a secret organization to force his father to be part of a drug-smuggling ring. A child is kidnapped by a secret organization to force his father to be part of a drug-smuggling ring.—Guy Bellinger

Title: Return of the Prodigal Son
Synopsis: Engineer Jan Sebek (Jan Kacer) is undergoing treatment in a mental home after his unsuccessful attempt to commit suicide. His therapist, via discussions both with the patient and with people who know him, tries to find out what made the young and seemingly satisfied man decide to end his own life. Jan's pretty wife Jana (Jana Brejchová) claims not to know about anything but she is conducting an affair with a family friend, almost publicly and with the blessing of her parents.—NFA.cz

Title: Bitter Fruit
Synopsis: A police drama set in an unidentified and oppressed South American country among a group of conspirators. The main characters are two sisters Soledad and Tita.

Title: Spy Pit
Synopsis: Julien Saint Dominique, an agent of the French counter-espionage service in Berlin, investigates the kidnapping of a functionary taken by German communists into East Germany.

Title: Io non protesto, io amo
Synopsis: Caterina, a young teacher, has a hobby of singing and occasionally delights her students.

Title: Boys and Girls
Synopsis: Ten young people (six boys and four girls), most of whom students, rent a house in bad repair and set about living together. The experience is not obvious and the ten tenants have to cope with more than one difficulty. But they also have their moments. Things really go awry when Françoise, an unmarried girl, is forced to deliver the baby she carries prematurely and when Solange, the lonely girl of the group, attempts suicide. Shortly afterwards, the group learns that the house is due for demolition. They decide to take advantage of this opportunity to face adult life individually.—Guy Bellinger

Title: Angel with the Iron Fists
Synopsis: A father whose daughter is killed by the Devil Girl's Gang, goes in search of justice.

Title: Svatba jako remen
Synopsis: A comedy about two bumbling policemen investigating an alleged rape in a small Czech town. One of the alleged rapists is supposed to get married the day he's locked up.

Title: Diamond 33
Synopsis: A professor who found out a formula to make diamonds from oil is killed in Tehran and his nephew who is a spy is sent to Tehran by Interpol in order to find the formula. Action thriller. A professor who has discovered a formula for producing oil is murdered in Tehran. His niece Linda who is a member of the International Police begins an investigation. She is helped by a young man called Reza also from Tehran. It turns out that Reza is a member of the police force in Iran.

Title: Catch As Catch Can
Synopsis: Bob is a successful actor, but his career gets doomed by a strange phenomenon: the animal kingdom is taking on him.

Title: Motel Wives
Synopsis: Capri, the owner of a motel, arranges for husbands and wives to meet their lovers in privacy. When a woman fails to show up for a tryst, Capri herself substitutes for the woman. She joins in an orgy with two men and two women and watches a young couple make love for the first time.

Title: Date for a Murder
Synopsis: Vince Dreyser, an American detective in Rome, agrees to meet an old chemist friend, who is also in the city to marry a woman named Lidia. When his friend fails to show up, Dreyser begins searching for him, only to be attacked by two gangsters.

Title: The Murderer Is the Victim
Synopsis: Melahat: "What is your name?" Mustafa: "Mustafa. But I am not sure that Mustafa or not. I remember that one day a woman called me as a Mustafa but i don't know did she called me or someone else."

Title: The House of Lost Souls
Synopsis: Escaped inmate of a mental home Franz Moose has been found shot dead in the forest. In the course of their investigation, District Commander Havel (Jirí Adamíra) and Lieutenant Mares (Miroslav Zounar) slowly work their way through the complicated case. Havel learns from the employees' testimonies that Moose was facing trial for war crimes before he was finally sent to the hospital. There he shared his room with Kozdera, spent his time painting, and made several attempts to escape. Havel wants to interrogate Kozdera but the unfortunate patient gets killed before he can do so.—NFA.cz

Title: Operation St. Peter's
Synopsis: Small time crook Napoleone falls into an unlikely gang made up of a gangster, called The Baron, and his two cohorts, Agonia and The Captain, where Napoleone takes them to Rome where they shack up with a shady used car dealer caled Il Cajella to help finance their new life of crime by planing to rob a statue from the Vatican. But a big-time American gangster, named Joe Ventura, hears about the heist and wants the priceless statue for himself by having his mistress, Samantha, come onto and betray the woman-hungry Cajella to give the statue away to her.—Anonymous Napoleon (Lando Buzzanca) is a small-time crook with big ideas. In prison in Naples where he is serving time for a robbery charge, he is sprung by accident when a foppish villain calling himself the Baron (Pinuccio Ardia) and his two numb-skull cohorts, Agonia (Ugo Fangareggi) and the Captain (Dante Maggio), tunnel under his cell, having lost their way to an expected bank vault. Napoleon escapes with his rescuers through the tunnel, and upon arrival on the outside of the prison, he discovers that the three are flat broke, despite the well-dressed appearance of the Baron. Napoleon swiftly asserts himself as leader of the group by pretending to be a master criminal and suggests that they move to Rome for richer pickings. The four of them are forced to travel to Rome in the back of a cattle truck since they do not have a car.On the outskirts of Rome, the gang falls in with a seedy crook and gigolo who called himself Il Cajella (Jean-Claude Brailey), who owns a dilapidated used-car lot which Napoleon elects as his gangs hide-out and Cajella as their co-conspirator/protector. At first, Napoleon's renewed criminal activates are unambitious and he is soon caught sealing a womans purse at a local shopping mall. Before the security guards can call the police, Marisa (Christine Barclay) the woman whose purse hed stolen comes, forward the announces that she knows him and saves him from arrest. Marisa insists on calling Napoleon "Filiberto", as it turns out merely because he resembles her dead husband.Meanwhile, Cajella encounters the beautiful Samantha (Uta Levka) while cruising for trade at a singles bar mainly populated by wealthy older women. Cajella is unaware that Samantha belongs to a big American criminal named Joe Ventura (Edward G. Robinson). Elsewhere, the increasingly starved gang of crooks attempt to raise money to buy food by conning American tourists by offering them a private view of Michaelangelo's famous Pieta which is currently shielded from dusty by a huge curtain during renovations. When a Vatican employees leaves a forklift truck unattended, Napoleon sees away to pull off a job he believes could place him amongst the giants of crime. Napoleon tells the Baron that he will steal the famous statue of the Madonna the Christ from the Vatican. This huge edifice, some 15 feet high and weighing several tons, can be sold a lot of money. To the horror and admiration of his cohorts, Napoleon swathes the statue in a blanket and brazenly carries it on the forklift truck out into the streets of Rome.Back at their hideout, the hungry crooks are jubilant, resolving to sell the priceless stature, for a meager some of 30 million lira. But Cajella lets it slip to Samantha that they have the Pieta. Joe Ventura overhears this and forces Cajella to betray his friends by revealing the statues location.Meanwhile, Napoleon brings Marisa to the hide-out so he can try to seduce her, until he accidentally dislodges the sheet to reveal the Pieta. Marisa, a strict Catholic, falls on her knees in prayer and shames Napoleon into doing likewise. She drags him to a nearby church to confess his crimes. Afterwards, she insists that the statue be returned. Napoleon concedes but claims to the Vatican religious authorities that he only found the statue. Napoleon and Marisa leads the Vatican officials to the gangs hide-out. However, Ventura and his henchmen have arrived at the hide-out first and have bribed the Baron and his group with food, and made off with the statue themselves. Wanted posters depicting Ventura and Cajella are distributed throughout Italy.Ventura and his men decide to head to Sicily, the statue in tow in a caravan, with the Vatican police and diverse cardinals, priests, and monks in hot pursuit. Ventura is forced to stop for a small village parade passing by dramatizing the Stations of the Cross. Then the actor playing Jesus Christ spots Cajella and climbs down from cross to alert the centurions before grabbing a child's bicycle and chasing off after them. Amongst all this, Napoleon, Marisa, the Baron, the Captain and Agonia have teamed up with Cardinal Braun (Heinz Ruhman), a Vatican official with particular interest in the thieves, and who drives like a maniac after the fleeing criminals. Braun drives off a pier and crashes the car on board Ventura's boat just as it sets off for Sicily with the statue. To everyones surprise, Ventura hands his gun to Braun for it's revealed that Ventura and Braun were old friends in the Mafia before Braun saw the light. As the boat sails away with both gangs on board, Samantha and Cajella are left behind on the pier. Samantha escapes on water skies and Cajella tries to swim after her to escape from a group of angry female clients of his waiting on the pier.

Title: Romance for Bugle
Synopsis: A lyrical story about first love, death and disappointment, based on a poem of the same title.

Title: Le grand bidule
Synopsis: An East European scientist smuggled out of his country by the French is supposed to perfect his invention in suburban Paris, but he is much more interested in having a good time.

Title: The Silent Swordsman
Synopsis: A young swordsman is tasked to lead a patriotic secret society to fight a traitorous general who conspired with the enemy to invade their country. In due course, he meets two pretty sisters from a rural tribe and is caught between the affections of the two girls.

Title: Morderca zostawia slad
Synopsis: In the last days of WW2, Polish military looks for the murderer of prosecutor responsible for storing Gestapo files.

Title: El hombre de Caracas
Synopsis: After escaping from a prison camp, an undercover Policeman infiltrates a Revolutionary Movement bent on stealing guns and ammo for their cause. He finds that he must combat the entire group single-handed. Larry Anderson

Title: Lusting Hours
Synopsis: Presented as an inquiry into the ways of lust, this film is staged as a documentary. It moves from rural prostitution (the roadhouse) to pornographers, then on to streetwalkers, male hustlers, and high-class call girls. The madam runs the bordello, she depends on the photographer to supply her with pornography; he's in the city, using his camera to lead him into depravity. The streetwalkers risk arrest from the cops and abuse from the johns. Even the call girls have a tough time: from their expenses to their lack of self-reflection. Their motto: "Live fast, die young, and make a beautiful corpse."—<jhailey@hotmail.com>

Title: Viva Rena
Synopsis: The striking resemblance between two cousins--a popular performer, and a little-known Corfiote singer--will involve the latter in a faithful impersonation to keep the show going at a reception. Can anyone unmask the well-meaning impostor? In contrast to her successful cousin who lives in Rome--the popular performer, Pepita di Corfu--the little-known Corfiote singer, Rena Papaliou, has settled for a lacklustre life away from the show business along with her brother, Stratos. The only thing the two cousins have in common is a striking physical resemblance--a vital attribute that will soon come in handy when an unforeseen complication refrains Pepita from attending the glamorous reception of the affluent ship owner, Labros Fokas. Now, Rena becomes Pepita to keep the show going; however, won't anyone unmask the well-meaning impostor?—Nick Riganas

Title: El milagro del cante
Synopsis: A broken down bus gets foreigners to participate in the beauty of flamenco, spreading it among tourists who will make the city a must stop to enjoy the best spanish folklore.

Title: Sinekli Bakkal
Synopsis: The love and marriage story of Rabia, who was raised with religious education, and Italian pianist Peregrini, who became a Muslim for her sake.

Title: The Goddess of Mercy
Synopsis: The youngest daughter of a brutal king is sent into exile after openly criticizing the cruel treatment heaped on the peasants.

Title: Pecos Cleans Up
Synopsis: Three musicians arrive in a Mexican village destroyed by El Supremo and learn, from the only survivor, of the lost treasure of Montezuma hidden in an Aztec temple. Along comes Pecos and the search is on.

Title: Santh Wahate Krishna Mai
Synopsis: Chandrakant Mandhare, the prestigious Deshmukh of the village, will not be able to look after the village for the sake of his own self. Deshmukh's arrogant and courageous attitude has left all the villages thirsty. In this village, formerly a civil engineer Raja Paranjpe comes and he plans to use water on Krishna and use it for the village's agriculture. Deshmukh, who is blinded by his selfishness, determines the teacher as mad But one day Arun sarneek is listening to the meaningful song that he is saying and he gets stunned by hearing the meaning of that song, but he also drives them mad. Ultimately Arun Sarnaik executes this plan and despite this, against the leaders of the village, the scheme succeeds and the Ganga ceremony is successful.—Cinekatta

Title: Mat bond
Synopsis: Mat Bond is a loser who lives with his nagging mother but leads a secret life. Man must foil an evil attempt to dominate the world, with a suitcase falling into the wrong hands, an umbrella flying and magic pills that make it invincible.

Title: ¿Qué hacemos con los hijos?
Synopsis: Antonio Martínez is an old-fashioned cab driver who rides around Madrid, boasting about his children: Juan, who shares his job as a cab driver; Luisa, a ladies' hairdresser, Antoñito, who is studying to be a lawyer, and Paloma, who is going to be a housewife. But what Antonio does not know... yet is that his children are not exactly the way he thinks: Paloma who wants to marry a city policeman (a living nightmare for the poor driver !); Juan who is a cheeky guy leading a dissolute life; Antoñito who wants to be a bullfighter; and Luisa, who is a... go-go girl.The day Antonio finds out, he confronts his wife and children and suffers a great disappointment. Since then no one in the family speaks to Antonio, and he thinks it best to leave them to see for themselves that they have made a mistake, but this will not work either, since each one will see their problems increase.—Guy Bellinger Taxi driver Antonio discovers one day that each of his children have been hiding their true way of life. He will try, with a typical hard attitude, for them to obey him, despite not being totally sure if his methods are the right ones or his teaching is appropriate.

Title: Top Crack
Synopsis: A couple of aspiring criminals kidnap a big producer who, to bring the request of the ransom to a good end, is forced to personally direct the operation.

Title: Placer sangriento
Synopsis: A masked killer prowls the beaches of Argentina, injecting beautiful girls with heroin, and then using weird organ music to make them his zombie slaves.

Title: Tiffany memorandum
Synopsis: Dick Hallan, a journalist for the Herald-Tribune gets mixed up in international politics through a series of incredible coincidences and is finally coerced by the CIA (not really) to follow the intrigue to its unremarkable end.

Title: Ana
Synopsis: Sevket is killed while he escaping blood vengeance. After that, Döndü must look after her children in despite of poverty and blood vengeance.

Title: La Traviata
Synopsis: Anna Moffo in Verdi's La traviata. Mario Lanfranchi's film version of this beloved opera classic is faithful to the Dumas story, bringing to life the tragic story of Camille (here called Violetta) with gripping drama and sumptuous sets and costumes.

Title: No Stars in the Jungle
Synopsis: The story begins with this man who wants to steal the gold from an old woman. But then, while maintaining a strong allegorical bent, drifts toward a more complex thing, using a labyrinth like narrative that goes back and forth.

Title: Love on Lesvos
Synopsis: A Greek-American expatriate with six months to live embezzles millions from his New York City company and flees to his hometown of Mytilene. But law and fate never forget, and a chance encounter with love complicates matters. Diagnosed with an end-stage disease, Greek-American expatriate Jimmy Anthony only has six months to live. Afraid but empowered by the tragic revelation, Jim embezzles millions from his New York City company and flees to his hometown of Mytilene to spend his last days. But law and fate never forget. As an inquisitive detective follows a faint trail of clues, determined to find the culprit and bring him to justice, Jim has a chance encounter with love. Now, a pretty brunette further complicates matters. With his life hanging by a thread, will Jim pluck up the courage to admit his mistake before it's too late?—Nick Riganas

Title: Non mi dire mai good-bye
Synopsis: A Sicilian girl madly in love with a famous singer plays any trick to enflame him. Will she win his heart?

Title: Valley of Death
Synopsis: Swinging Sixties spy caper, 'a cocktail of sex and adventure' with an all-star international cast.

Title: Order of the Daisy
Synopsis: Jean-Louis Matouzec works for French National Library as an expert looking after the restoration of old manuscripts.He falsifies marriage certificates as his wife refuses divorce.

Title: A Game Without Rules
Synopsis: A robbery in a Prague jeweler's shop results in the shop manager Kubát and his deputy Litera being shot and wounded. The culprits take the jewelery away in a stolen car and that very night hide the loot tens of kilometers outside Prague in a forest. Then the three robbers part with each other. One of them, Burian, leaves in the same car, the other two, Duda and Hovorka, take to flight in another car, which soon ends up in a car crash. Hovorka dies in the accident, but Duda survives and hides in an abandoned cottage. Burian is arrested, Duda is traced out by a police dog. Duda confesses to the robbery to the criminologist Málek, but refuses to say where is the jewelery. The robber then begins to shoot and Málek kills him in self-defense. The court fails to prove Litera's involvement in the robbery and the only one convicted is Burian. The disappointed Málek leaves the police and begins to work as a cab driver.—NFA.cz

Title: You Don't Strike a Woman Even with a Flower
Synopsis: Shortish forty-year old Ludvík Podzimek, lute and flute player in a Prague orchestra, is far from being an attractive man. He is nevertheless generally considered a great 'Don Juan'. Women take up with him out of a certain motherly compassion and Ludvík's tender heart does not allow him to split with any of them. His lovers thus accumulate and cause him numerous troubles.—NFA.cz

Title: That Man in Chang-an
Synopsis: A romantic Han Dynasty adventure epic of a dying Emperor, an Evil Queen, a beautiful Princess, a dastardly royal nephew, and a masked hero, with plots and counter-plots galore, complete with cliffhangers and last-second rescues.

Title: Table for Love
Synopsis: Elizabeth is a young woman who seeks happiness excessively burning out all those around her.

Title: Hell of Borneo
Synopsis: A wealthy mercenary lives in blissful solitude on his private island in the Philippines, until it's invaded by pirates, mobsters, and smugglers.

Title: Dos pintores pintorescos
Synopsis: After a clumsy painter indirectly becomes the witness of a murder, the murderers chase after him in order to kill him too.

Title: Get Up and Dance the Sirtaki
Synopsis: With his pockets crammed with cash, a countryman in Athens becomes the target of a plotting compatriot and a beautiful singer who want to rinse him for every penny. But, he's already in love with the girl next door. Can he win this bet? After a long streak of bad luck, Thimios, the lively countryman with a heart of gold, finally gets his lucky break. With his pockets crammed with cash after betting on the horse races, Thimios' life takes a turn for the better, unbeknownst to him, however, that his plotting compatriot, Lakis, his partner-in-crime, Tasos, and Zouzou, the beautiful singer who serves as bait, are hell-bent on rinsing him for every penny. But, Thimios is already in love with Lina, and he'll do everything in his power to win her heart; including thwarting her mother's plans to marry her off to the wealthy shoe-store owner, Prokopis. Can Thimios win this bet?—Nick Riganas

Title: A Certain Killer
Synopsis: A former soldier, reduced to working at a restaurant post-war, becomes a contract killer for the yakuza gangs he's in contact with. The main character is a man from the WW2 generation who has lost his dreams in post-war Japan. While working as a cook in a restaurant he also earns some money as a contract killer. He kills a Yakuza-boss using a tatami-needle and hides in a shabby apartment in a suburb.—Anonymous

Title: Dubravka
Synopsis: A coming of age drama. Dubravka, a teenage girl who lives in a resort town by the Black Sea, approaches adolescence.

Title: Blueprint for a Massacre
Synopsis: A series of incidents involving aircrafts belonging to NATO nations indicates a systematic sabotage.

Title: Where Is the Third King?
Synopsis: A duo of policemen under cover investigates a planned painting theft in a provincial palace museum. They have to face a murder, and a suspect is among museum workers. In addition, there are more copies of the painting revealed. Polish Militia (police) learns about a planned theft on an old painting from a provincial museum in a lonely palace. A duo of police officers under cover of a married couple travels there to put a trap and replace the painting with a copy first. Surprisingly, there occurs a murder with a medieval weapon, and a suspect is among museum workers. In addition, there are more copies of the painting revealed. The question is, who is a killer, and where is the original.—Pibwl

Title: Haci Bektas Veli
Synopsis: The life story of Haji Bektash-i Veli, one of the great Islamic religious saints from Turkistan, who endeavored to spread Islam in Anatolia, starting from Khorasan and ending in Anatolia. Sheikh Abdullah performs miracles and brings benefactions around him. He goes on the road to teach Islam to pagan and atheist peoples. He settles in Byzantium where he preaches the good word, writes books and foils the plots of the priests to kill him.—Guy Bellinger

Title: Los perversos
Synopsis: Priest is sympathetic and understanding toward mod-era young folks and their new world-view - but he gets in trouble with a biker gang and with a young woman who crushes unhealthily on him.

Title: Nora Zain: Ajen wanita 001
Synopsis: Nora Zain, a Malayan female spy agent, is sent to Hong Kong to deal with an international diamond smuggling syndicate.

Title: Fistful of Diamonds
Synopsis: The head of a diamond cartel eliminates all of his partners and takes over. The widow of one of the group hires a NY detective to reclaim her share. They fall in love and end up in a shoot-out in Turkey. Larry Anderson.

Title: La Cigarra está que arde
Synopsis: "The Cigar is Lit" - Different situations of couples who are in a hotel for appointments.

Title: O gabros mou, o proikothiras
Synopsis: A man who already has a long-term relationship gets involved with a love-smitten heiress; however, his good friend and colleague isn't willing to take this situation lying down. Now, let's see how he will manage to get out of this mess. Even though Zacharias already has a long-term relationship with Eleftheria, he still wants to make it big by marrying into money. Before long, an unexpected but marvellous opportunity will arise in the person of the affluent and love-smitten heiress, Ourania, who sees in Zacharias the perfect husband; nevertheless, his good friend and colleague, Thomas, isn't willing to take this situation lying down. As a result, Thomas and Eleftheria devise an intricate plan to teach the shameless cheater a lesson and beat him at his own game. Now, let's see how Zacharias will manage to get out of this mess.—Nick Riganas

Title: Grandes amigos
Synopsis: Antonio has two wishes he would like to see come true--having friends and seeing the sea. The friendship part was hard for him because of the bullying, but he managed and with their help he was also able to fulfill his second wish.

Title: The Dress Rehearsal
Synopsis: In La prova generale, Carlo (Carlo Cecchi) interviews with a tape machine and a microphone his young lover while the two wander in the beautiful splendour of a wood on the edge of the city.

Title: Master Stroke
Synopsis: In Madrid, actor Lang is hired by Monsieur Bernard to impersonate a certain Owen for a time. Lang is trained for his role, that is to replace Owen as the diamond pickup controller at General Diamond in London.

Title: The Story of a Discharged Prisoner
Keluarga 69
Synopsis: A father and son business team is estranged when the son is thrown out of his home. He then teams up with a kindly former tenant who helps him become a successful singer but not without a few rough patches along the way. Mismatched romance alliances within the family makes up for a hilarious reconciliation.—madjanssen

Title: Agniputhri
Synopsis: Watch the full movie, Agniputhri, only on Eros Now. Agniputhri is a 1967 Indian Malayalam film, directed by M. Krishnan Nair and produced by Prem Navas. The film stars Prem Nazir, Sheela, T. R. Omana and T. S. Muthaiah in lead roles. The film had musical score by MS Baburaj.

Title: Johar in Bombay
Synopsis: An antique shop keeper inadvertently releases a wish-granting Genie from a lamp. Rajesh lives a fairly lifestyle in Bombay, along with his uncle, Gulu, and Bua, Saraswati. He regularly dreams of wooing and marrying Anarkali, and one day does come across her in the shape and form of an actress, Nalini, who instantly rejects him. She lives with her scientist father, who is on the verge of inventing a revolutionary weapon that can eliminate any obstacle - big or small - including buildings. Some foreigners come to know of this, and abduct him to acquire the formula. Nalini cannot go to the police for fear of losing her father, and seeks the help of Rajesh and Gulu, who are both clueless. Then Rajesh inadvertently releases a wish-granting genie from a lamp who also possesses magical powers. But as things turn out, his involvement results in even more complications for the hapless trio.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: How to Kill 400 Duponts
Synopsis: Dorellik, an Italian contract killer that lives on the French Riviera, accepts a job to kill everyone with the surname Dupont that lives in France for a rich customer which supposedly would allow him to obtain a large inheritance. The French Riviera is plagued by the criminal phenomenon Dorellik with his satanic laughter and the French police call Scotland Yard for help in the person of Commissioner Green. Dorellik is, however, financially in dire straits, so much so that he is abandoned by the secretary. He then looks for work with an ad in a newspaper and finds it: he is commissioned by Rafael Dupont to kill all the other Dupont of France in order to be the only heir to a Brazilian billionaire. Dorellik begins his work alongside the attempt to recapture the secretary.—Baldinotto da Pistoia

Title: Seful sectorului suflete
Synopsis: Young chemist Magdalena imagines how the perfect man should look like. The question is whether her old flame, meteorologist Gore, can fulfil Magdalena's criteria. As she can no longer continue her failed relationship, young chemist Magdalena imagines how the perfect man should look like. Gore, a meteorologist and former friend who was in love with her, identifies in the end with the true love imagined by Magdalena.—George Varza

Title: Diary of a Swinger
Synopsis:
Jeannie relates her life story to her shrink. Pretty, 21-year-old Jeannie lives on a New England farm with her parents. While walking around one morning, she is caught by a guy who rapes her. Once recovered from this tragedy, she packs her bags and leaves to earn a living. Starting as a secretary in an agency, she becomes one of her generation's most famous high-fashion models. Between impossible loves and disillusionment, Jeannie fights to the end to make her dreams come true.—Sens Critique "Diary Of A Swinger" vividly portrays the private hell beneath the public glamor of a swinger...today's turn-on girl. The girl who must be where the action is...be the action, no matter what the cost. How does a quiet girl from a small New England town become a swinger...a straw girl, a hollow girl? Jeannie is twenty-one and she has had the course...all the kicks...all the glitter...and un unsuccessful suicide attempt that finally forces her to accept psychiatric care.
Through intimate flash-backs the audience sees in clinical detail all the emotionally searing events that brought her to the brink of suicide.Was it the rape? In the early morning of her womanhood, Jeannie loved to roam the bright, clean farmlands near her home. One morning she met a local farmhand...they walked together...talked a while...then finally she found herself in the fragrant meadow grass...his virile shoulders blocked the sun and in her eyes warm mist obscured the sky...a little scream died in her throat. But was it rape? The solid farm folk didn't think so. The accusation in their eyes affirmed their knowledge of their guilt.Escape. From them, from herself. Jeannie came to New York to lose herself in the lonely crowd. There she shared an apartment with Vivian, warm, knowing, and self-sufficient without men. Jeannie became a secretary in a theatrical agency. Here she hoped to begin a career in the glamor industry, and here she met Jim, a smooth, handsome young actor on his way up. At first their relationship seemed to be the love she needs so desperately to give and receive. But there is room in Jim's ego for only love. Jim can only take, not give. She runs for him when he tries to seduce her and it becomes obvious that he can only make love, not love.Because of her beauty, Jeannie is fair game for every male on the make. The head of the agency keeps pressuring her and finally attacks her in his office. She moves on to become a model in the shadow world of high fashion. Here the roles of the sexes are obscured and relationships superficial. Jeannie longs for Jim. She tries to reach him, but he has left town on tour. When he returns she runs to him, ready now to settle for only the appearance of a normal love affair. He takes her to an opening night party. But the party turns into a jet-set orgy. When Jeannie refuses to join him in the sexual fun games, Jim grabs another girl and makes love to her in front of Jeannie. Frightened, and distraught, Jeannie runs home.She surprises a burglar. Cornered, alone in her apartment, the burglar attacks and rapes her. When he escapes she makes the suicide attempt that brings her to the psychiatrist.The psychiatrist tries to help, to reach out...but it is all too late for Jeannie, her emotional wounds are permanent...unable now to ever enjoy healthy relations with a man, she turns reluctantly to the security of Vivian's strange, unnatural love.

Title: In the Town of S
Synopsis: "In the City of S." is a Soviet film adaptation of one of Anton Pavlovich Chekhov's most famous short stories "Ionich". This is a story about a young promising doctor Dmitry Ionich Startsev, who moves to a county town where he was appointed a doctor. At first, the life of a budding newcomer in these parts was literally in full swing. He had a lot of new acquaintances and discoveries ahead of him. He met the Turkins, a well-known family in these parts, who were known in the district for their education. Over time, he began to visit them often, where he fell in love with the young Ekaterina Turkina. However, the ambitious girl did not want to stay further in the province and went to Moscow to enter the conservatory, refusing Startsev's offer. Ionich remained where it all began, sinking more and more into the abyss of a well-fed and sluggish existence.

Title: He and She
Synopsis: He is an innocent recluse. She is an irresistible young temptress. Their union unlocks the abundant gifts of love; but, it will also bring to light the intruder's hidden side. Can lambs coexist with wolves? Desirous of rediscovering herself and leave behind the unbreakable shackles of modern life, the alluring wife of the general director of the Modernization Program seeks refuge in an isolated haven surrounded by sea and palm trees. There, a chance encounter with a reclusive young man who falls prey to her beguiling charm will help her find purpose and meaning in her otherwise uneventful life, cherishing the island's abundant gifts--tranquillity, innocence, and love--as a member of the secluded community. However, before long, the past catches up with her, bringing to light the intruder's repulsive hidden side. Can lambs coexist with wolves?—Nick Riganas

Title: Rocambole contra la secta del escorpión
Synopsis: Romcabole battles against an evil sect that plans on taking over the world.

Title: El hueso
Synopsis: A journalist finds out that in France there is a bone of one of the most illustrious ancestors of the people in the Middle Ages. From that moment, everyone agrees that the bone should return to the town.

Title: I barbieri di Sicilia
Synopsis: In a little Sicilian village two hairdressers who are in love with the same girl manage to sabotage the bacteriological weapons the Nazis are preparing to use against the allied armies invasion.

Title: Ah! Afti I Gynaika Mou
Synopsis: A man finds out that his boss had a quarrel with his wife, so he now tries to present her as his housemaid... Still waiting for that splendid and long-awaited promotion, the young and ambitious office employee, Dimitris, and his fashionable wife, Nina, get their hopes up when the strategic and respectful position of the firm's assistant manager suddenly becomes vacant. Without a doubt, Dimitris truly deserves this job--and what better way to seal the deal, than to invite his manager to dinner, to discuss it over a hearty portion of slow-cooked rabbit stew with caramelised onions? Indeed, this is the best approach; however, Nina's brief but spirited verbal altercation with the gourmand guest only minutes before the much-expected event will threaten to pour the couple's aspirations down the drain, unless, they come up with a desperate but brilliantly devious plan. Can Nina pull off a surprising success?—Nick Riganas

Title: Ninth External Ward
Synopsis: Crippled and foot bone damaged young boy Burhan loves Nuzhet. There is someone else, Dr. Ragip who is on the verge of marriage with Nuzhet.

Title: Voyage of Silence
Synopsis: "O salto" means the leap, more precisely the big leap Potuguese illegal emigrants have to make when they decide to leave their native land. They do it because they cannot put up with poverty any longer or because they want to escape the dictatorship that is rife at home or else to avoid military service and its corollary, colonialist wars in Africa. "O salto" documents the difficult journey of one of these candidates for emigration, Antonio, a serious carpenter, complete from his living place to the Spanish border and its unwelcoming "Guardia Civil" to his walk through the Pyrenees to his his final journey to Paris, by truck, by taxi and by train. It also relates the difficult living and working conditions Antonio experiences once in Paris, softened by the solidarity of his Portuguese brothers.—Guy Bellinger

Title: Ervinka
Synopsis: A good-natured but incorrigible layabout becomes embroiled in a plot to rob the Israeli lottery, all the while indulging in his boundless zeal for mischief and romance. Following the international success of his classic Sallah Shabbati, Ephraim Kishon once again combined his witty brand of social satire with the talents of Chaim Topol to create a memorably comic Israeli anti-hero. As the title character, a good-natured but incorrigible layabout, Topol becomes embroiled in a plot to rob the Israeli lottery, all the while indulging his boundless zeal for mischief and romance.—National Center for Jewish Film

Title: Lamiel
Synopsis: The story follow young orphan Lamiel as she rises from poverty into high society under the guidance of a doctor, who lives vicariously through her.

Title: Paryz - Warszawa bez wizy
Synopsis: Polish ace pilot reminisces his wartime and post-war experiences, including his first ever passenger on board.

Title: A Choice of Killers
Synopsis: Since the car accident that caused the death of his wife, the comics author Stéphane Destouches sinks into alcohol and wanders the roads of Morocco.

Title: Maiorul si moartea
Synopsis: Refusing to give protection to an accomplice to a crime who had provided him with useful information, Major Tache puts his life in danger by being threatened by an old gangster who signs his messages "Death".

Title: Hare Kanch Ki Chooriyan
Synopsis: Mohini Saxena is the only child in the Saxena household, which consists of her Professor dad, Kishanlal, and bed-ridden, ailing mom. She is a medical student, quite free-willed, and friendly with everyone, including young men. And it is for this reason that she has a fainting spell, which when diagnosed results in a pregnancy. Kishanlal is devastated, all the more when his wife finds out and dies suddenly. Alone, and with a pregnant daughter, who is expelled from college, Kishanlal attempts to find out who the father is, for Mohini has decided not to reveal the name of the father. Is he their neighbor's son, Bipin Bose with whom Mohini was quite friendly with? Or is he, Ravi Kumar Mehra, the son of wealthy Amarchand Mehra, Kishanlal's business partner, with whom Mohini spent quite a few romantic moments? or is it some other young man that Mohini has been seeing on the sly. Watch what transpires as the hapless Kishanlal attempts to plead with Mehras and Boses' in an attempt to ensure a better future for his now black-listed, visibly pregnant, daughter.—rAjOo (gunwanti@hotmail.com)

Title: Mördaren - En helt vanlig person
Synopsis: People on a train get murdered. Who is the murderer? Everybody on the train is a suspect. One of them is the homosexual dope fiend.

Title: Los alegres Aguilares
Synopsis: The adventurer Manuel comes across Carlos, who is almost his identical twin. Manuel comes from a rich family so he offers Carlos some money to pass himself off as him for a young woman that wants to marry him. Carlos asks him to return the favor.—Anonymous
